Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.LeaderCards

Class ProdPowerLeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.LeaderCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.LeaderCards.ProdPowerLeaderCard
public class ProdPowerLeaderCard
extends LeaderCard
Production Power Leader Card A Leader Card that takes one (or more) resource and gives back --> one (or more) resource chosen by the player and one (or more) Faith point. It is activated with one (or more) Development Card.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProdPowerLeaderCard

      public ProdPowerLeaderCard​(CardType cardType, int vp, java.util.List<LeaderCardCost> activationCost, java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> productionIn, int outProductionResourceNum, int outProductionFaithPoints)
      Parameters:
      vp - Victory points
      activationCost - the cost to activate the Leader card for he first time, the activation cost for this specific Leader card is of Development card type. * An important supposition: FOR ALL THE LEADER CARDS THE ACTIVATION COST CAN'T BE TWO DV CARDS WITH THE SAME COLOUR!!
      productionIn - the type and number of resources that are necessary to activate the card and produce output.
      outProductionFaithPoints - number of faith points out of the production (in output)
      outProductionResourceNum - number of resources in output, the controller or the class that manages the production will use this number to know how many resources should the user choose.

      public java.lang.String toPath()
